nodes.text: Berrol's Donn was a planet in the Kriz sector of the Outer Rim Territories.
Following the Battle of Yavin, the planet had an Alliance to Restore the Republic base commanded by Zeke Rondel. The planet was also the location of Sangorn's Net.
In 4 ABY, after the Battle of Endor, the Berrol's Donn system was attacked by Nagai invaders during the Nagai–Tof War.
